project.name: HealthTracker Pro
project.description: A comprehensive health and fitness tracking application

icons.name: heart-rate-monitor
icons.description: Icon representing heart rate monitoring and cardiovascular health tracking

icons.name: step-counter
icons.description: Icon for step counting and walking activity tracking

icons.name: sleep-tracker
icons.description: Icon representing sleep monitoring and sleep quality analysis

icons.name: water-reminder
icons.description: Icon for hydration tracking and water intake reminders

icons.name: health-report
icons.description: Icon for health reports, analytics, and medical summaries

icons.name: medication-reminder
icons.description: Icon for medication schedules and pill reminders

icons.name: workout-planner
icons.description: Icon for exercise planning and fitness routines

icons.name: nutrition-tracker
icons.description: Icon for food logging and nutrition monitoring

prompts.base_template: Create a {complexity} {fill_style} icon for {description}. The icon should follow {design_system} design principles with {color_scheme} color scheme. Style: {corner_radius} corners, {stroke_width}px stroke width. Keywords: {keywords}. The icon should be clean, professional, and suitable for a {project_type} targeting {target_platforms}.
style_additions: Ensure the icon is scalable and works well at small sizes
Use consistent visual weight across all icons

metadata.author: HealthTracker Team
metadata.notes: Initial icon set for HealthTracker Pro mobile application. Focus on medical accuracy and user-friendly design.
